key.name: register_app_desc
key.value:
Follow these 3 simple steps to enable Facebook Connect on your site:

  • Create application and set a name for it. It should be your social network name so users remember that they signed up.
  • You will be given App ID and App Secret. Copy them to the form below and you are all set!
  • Index Email - this email is used as index for facebook profiles that do not have an email. If you set Index Email as admin@example.com those users will be automatically registered with admin+userID@example.com
After that Facebook Connect will be ready to use!
